customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Boolean value check
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Load demo plugin
  2. Using webapp, launch interactive dialog with `/dialog` command
  3. Set boolean values (boolean selectors) in the interactive dialog.
  4. Using iOS app, launch interactive dialog and set boolean values.
  5. Using Android app, launch interactive dialog and set boolean values.
inline.expectedResult: • For steps 3-5 verify that the values are boolean and not converted to strings when submitted (not `"true"` and `"false"` but `true` and `false`).

customFields.Related ticket(s): Fix default boolean values in interactive dialogs — MM-21683
